p: Conclusions: 1 The adsorbing membrane oXiris may decrease endotoxin in patients with EAA > 0,6. -2 This is accompanied by a reduction of Il6 and Pro calcitonin. 3- Endotoxin decrease to < 0,6 may increase survival. These data confirm, in part, a very recent study on liver failure treatment with a new extracorporeal liver device combining Septex filter with Oxiris.
